import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormControl, FormBuilder, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'] }) export class LoginComponent implements OnInit { userLogin: FormGroup; constructor(private fb: FormBuilder) { this.userLogin = this.fb.group({ email: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.email]], password: ['', [Validators.required]] }) } ngOnInit() { } }
